attachments.text:
Users should be able to provide feedback to the chat.  
This should be handled by a `Feedback` model, which has

• chat_message : fk to `ChatMessage`
• user : fk to `User`
• liked : boolean
• message : (optional) text

Make relevant views and serializers. Feedback should be listed with `/feedback` url, with possible filters -

• project_id
• chat_id
• chat_message_id
• liked

Only admins should be able to list and retrieve all feedback. Normal users can only list their own. Feedbacks cannot be deleted.
attachments.title: #75 Add Feedback

attachments.text:
*WHAT*
*:robot_face: Generated by Copilot at <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/commit/b549c211bb3d5ffc4ace5bf6eff2a4290ee6c0bb|b549c21>*

Improved the user interface and functionality of the `GLocationPicker` component by adding a `Popover` map panel and fixing a close icon bug.

*Proposed Changes*

• Fixes <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/4952|#4952>
• Replaced Material UI in FacilityCreate.tsx
• Wrapped close button of GLocationPicker with Popover.Button after replacing material UI's Popover component with headlessui's Popover component as that's the only way to close the Popover according to the docs.
• GLocationPicker component does not load the map in mobile view / at lower width and the search box and close button occupy the entire space as in the below screenshot. Fixed that issue too.

<https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/113630200/246691628-0b1a8d52-acc8-4f40-99ba-ed4b1f679f7a.png|image>

@ohcnetwork/care-fe-code-reviewers @ohcnetwork/code-reviewers

*HOW*
*:robot_face: Generated by Copilot at <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/commit/b549c211bb3d5ffc4ace5bf6eff2a4290ee6c0bb|b549c21>*

• Import the `Popover` component from `@headlessui/react` library to create a dismissible floating panel for the map (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/5719/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-c4bc281dcacf25e0ea09e5465988d6b4e3a2aee0b5f9b9a1d804b46e36f73999R8|link>)
• Wrap the close icon for the map in a `Popover.Button` component to control the visibility of the `Popover` component and fix a bug where the map would not close when clicking the icon (<https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/5719/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-c4bc281dcacf25e0ea09e5465988d6b4e3a2aee0b5f9b9a1d804b46e36f73999L204-R214|link>)
attachments.title: #5719 Replaced material ui in FacilityCreate.tsx

• Replaced useQuery and request utils with tanstack query in abdm
    ◦ Created a custom request util to handle api calls
    ◦ Created api functions instead of using routes structure
    ◦ Replaced all occurrences
•  Synced with Yashwanth on Labs frontend code refactor (creating atomic components)
• Started with Labs frontend code refactor
*Next*
• Try to complete converting ABDM fe into micro fe
    ◦ Convert pending form field components into shadcn components
    ◦ Make pubsub util used in patient register form work (consider using rxjs)

2024-12-23 00:00:00.text:
*17th December* to *22nd December*
• Wired form fields and types in care_abdm_fe micro frontend refactor
• Experimented with exposing contexts from core to remote apps _(only possible when remote apps are also running as servers instead of being served as static content)_
• Tried using rxjs to enable context for micro frontend remote apps _(partially done: poc done, should wire it)_
• Had multiple calls with Yaswanth on labs frontend refactor
• Had a call with Prafful to delegate camera enhancement PRs
• Planned out labs frontend code refactor _(atomic components)_
• Had multiple calls with Rithvik to discuss the structure of Questionnaire in the frontend and few backend questions regarding MedicineRequest
• Added MedicineStatement specs, model and viewset and related frontend MedicineStatement question.
• Had a call with NHCX on demo payor _(demo payor is available, will get started on NHCX Integration after our Release)_
*Next*
• Add MedicineAdministration spec, model, viewset and wire it in the frontend

Past week:
• Worked on suggested changes on Labs module backend
• Reviewed Labs frontend and followed up with Yaswanth
• Worked on pending refactors in ABDM micro fe (health facility configuration, showing health information, consent list in encounter tab)
• Worked on ABDM backend changes
    ◦ Refactor facility models with emr models
    ◦ Permissions update as per new RBAC
    ◦ FHIR Profile mapping (except Questionnaires)
    ◦ Scan and share (just create a patient, will do appointment later)
Next
• Fix issue with FHIR profile mapping (prescription and op consultation)
• Fix Scan and Share
• Look into consent manager compliance and check if we are fully complaint
